content.prompt: Which of the following developments is the most direct effect of the situation portrayed in the image?

choices.label: Increased public opposition to the use of nuclear weapons
Expanded use of military force to achieve foreign policy goals in Eastern Europe
Reduced congressional oversight of United States military interventions
Reduced public trust in the federal government and the president

skill.text: Skill 5.A: Identify patterns among or connections between historical developments and processes.
